Package kademlia.routing

Interface KademliaBucket

All Known Implementing Classes:
JKademliaBucket
public interface KademliaBucket
A bucket used to store Contacts in the routing table.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean containsContact​(Contact c)
    Checks if this bucket contain a contact
    boolean containsNode​(Node n)
    Checks if this bucket contain a node
    java.util.List<Contact> getContacts()  
    int getDepth()

    Create a new contact and insert it into the bucket.

    Adds a contact to the bucket
    int numContacts()
    Counts the number of contacts in this bucket.
    boolean removeContact​(Contact c)
    Remove a contact from this bucket.
    boolean removeNode​(Node n)
    Remove the contact object related to a node from this bucket

  • Method Details

    • insert

      Adds a contact to the bucket
      Parameters:
      c - the new contact

    • insert

      Create a new contact and insert it into the bucket.

    • containsNode

      boolean containsNode​(Node n)
      Checks if this bucket contain a node
      Parameters:
      n - The node to check for
      Returns:
      boolean

    • removeContact

      boolean removeContact​(Contact c)
      Remove a contact from this bucket. If there are replacement contacts in the replacement cache, select the last seen one and put it into the bucket while removing the required contact. If there are no contacts in the replacement cache, then we just mark the contact requested to be removed as stale. Marking as stale would actually be incrementing the stale count of the contact.
      Parameters:
      c - The contact to remove
      Returns:
      Boolean whether the removal was successful.

    • removeNode

      boolean removeNode​(Node n)
      Remove the contact object related to a node from this bucket
      Parameters:
      n - The node of the contact to remove
      Returns:
      Boolean whether the removal was successful.

    • numContacts

      int numContacts()
      Counts the number of contacts in this bucket.
      Returns:
      Integer The number of contacts in this bucket

    • getDepth

      int getDepth()
      Returns:
      Integer The depth of this bucket in the RoutingTable

    • getContacts

      java.util.List<Contact> getContacts()
      Returns:
      An Iterable structure with all contacts in this bucket
